alert.note: Alert for Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pickens County through 615 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reform. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reform, Shaw, North Pickens Airport and McShan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
